resources.string: Rules of the game: there will be three figures in front of you,two below and one above, two of them will contain numbers. It is necessary that the sum of the numbers from the two lower figures is equal to the number in the upper figure, for this you need to insert the missing number. \n\nExample: the number 7 is in the upper circle, the question mark is in one of the lower ones, and the number 4 is in the other. So the number 3 should be in place of the question mark, because 3 + 4 = 7
The required number of correct answers: %s
